entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
